entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
